name: Boney-Header Bird-Herder
description:
Boney-Headed Hird-Herder was created by a team of 2 during the GameDevMK Game Jam 2.  The theme was "Prehistoric Madness".

Xmas is coming and as a result so is a deadly winter!

As the only clever dinosaur left you must help herd the Gallimimus through the different stages before the deadly cold destroys everything in its path!

Goal:

Herd the Gallimimus into the summer lands. Be careful to  keep the gallimimus from the hungry saber-tooth feline!

Controls:

W,A,S,D to move the Triceratops
